eplR 0.1.0
  • Reference

Match statistics and Betting data for English Premier League (soccer) Games

Source: R/data.R
eplData.Rd

The dataset is a list of 17 dataframes covering EPL data from seasons 2002-2003 to 2018-2019. The data is retrieved from DataHub.io and Football-data.uk.

eplData

Format

A list of 10 data frames with 380 observations and 37 variables each:

Date

Date, in 'yyyy-mm-dd'

HomeTeam

Home Team Football Club

AwayTeam

Away Team Football Club

FTHG

Full Time Home Goals

FTAG

Full Time Away Goals

FTR

Full Time Results

HTHG

Half Time Home Goals

HTAG

Half Time Away Goals

HTR

Half TIme Results

Referee

Referee

HS

Home Team Shots

AS

Away Team Shots

HST

Home Team Shots on Target

AST

Away Team Shots on Target

HF

Home Team Fouls

AF

Away Team Fouls

HC

Home Team Corners

AC

Away Team Corners

HY

Home Team Yellow Cards

AY

Away Team Yellow Cards

HR

Home Team Red Cards

AR

Away Team Red Cards

B365H

Bet365 Home Team Win Odds

B365D

Bet365 Draw Odds

B365A

Bet365 Away Team Win Odds

IWH

Interwetten Home Team Win Odds

IWD

Interwetten Draw Odds

IWA

Interwetten Away Team Win Odds

WHH

William Hill Home Team Win Odds

WHD

William Hill Draw Odds

WHA

William Hill Away Team Win Odds

Source

https://datahub.io/sports-data/english-premier-league#readme

http://www.football-data.co.uk/englandm.php
